lead_paragraph: FIFA is still considering a request from new members Kosovo to allow a number of players to switch national teams and represent them, world soccer's ruling body said on Thursday.

headline.print_headline: FIFA Still Pondering Kosovo Plea for Player Switch
headline.main: FIFA Still Pondering Kosovo Plea for Player Switch
